title: The Movie Show
overview: Taped deep in the heart of the entertainment capital of the world in Modesto, Calif., The Movie Show is hosted by polar opposites Deb and Wade, both of whom have nothing in common other than their shared love of movies and that they're puppets. Each week they'll dish out hot takes on upcoming blockbusters, as well as classic fan-favorites.The show will feature exclusive deleted scenes and a star-studded line-up of interview guests, including Bruce the shark from "Jaws" and Steven King's laptop. Deb and Wade will also catch-up with everyone's favorite movie stars of yesteryear, such as the T-Rex from "Jurassic Park," Splinter from "Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles" and many more.
